Normal wolves always hunt at maximum intensity (theta=1), but you can choose differently.

I chose this theta because the number of sheep has increased, indicating a good opportunity for hunting. By increasing my intensity slightly from my previous theta, I can take advantage of the higher sheep population while still being cautious, as the number of wolves remains the same. This balance helps ensure my survival without overexerting myself.
